tokens.resolved_gloss: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
tokens.translation: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)

tokens.resolved_gloss: strictly a demonstrative particle, here; but used of time, now or then

tokens.resolved_gloss: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

tokens.resolved_gloss: a net, or (abstractly) capture; also a fastness

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: to strike with more or less violence (beat, fell, corrode); by implication (of attack) to knock together, i.e. surround or circulate
